paragraphs.text: As a U.S. representative, Markwayne Mullin (R-OK) earns a salary of $174,000 per year. He seems to be confused about where that money comes from, however.

879939faf723.title: Run this guy out of town.

paragraphs.name: 7b61
paragraphs.text: Run this guy out of town.

d70f14d2a41f.title: Sounds like out of Nanny Pelosi’s playbook.

paragraphs.name: fbdb
paragraphs.text: Sounds like out of Nanny Pelosi’s playbook.

a4a265e0a287.title: I get the outrage, but my question is, “why” do “voters” continue to vote arrogant pricks like this…

paragraphs.name: d1dc
paragraphs.text: I get the outrage, but my question is, “why” do “voters” continue to vote arrogant pricks like this into office? Believe a few comments are from constituents from this douchebag’s district, so I’d truly like to know from anyone who lives there, “why?”...smh.

paragraphs.name: 8ba2
paragraphs.text: Congressman Mullin took $370,000.00 dollars of Obama stimulus money to expand his business. At the same time he bad mouthed that stimulus and said it was wasteful and taxpayers shouldn’t foot the bill. He was my congressman. I can’t believe people in Oklahoma send that clown back to DC over and over again.

virtuals.subtitle: So let’s see if I got this. You claim that you and you alone are paying your salary because you’ve paid that much in taxes. Excuse me …

b699bba8f8b0.title: “I would have never run for office, if it wasn’t for the fact that my biggest threat to my company…

content.subtitle: So let’s see if I got this. You claim that you and you alone are paying your salary because you’ve paid that much in taxes. Excuse me …

paragraphs.name: 9bfb
paragraphs.text: “I would have never run for office, if it wasn’t for the fact that my biggest threat to my company was the federal government and the overreach of the EPA. They’ve gone too far and it’s time for them to be pulled back in,” he added.

paragraphs.name: bd4b
paragraphs.text: So let’s see if I got this. You claim that you and you alone are paying your salary because…

paragraphs.name: d49a
paragraphs.text: What an arrogant fool. I’m sure he gets paid his salary and he works for the taxpayer. Though most of them just work for their campaign contributors. I hope he loses the next campaign and goes back to his plumbing business.

paragraphs.name: d642
paragraphs.text: Will Rodgers would be ashamed.

960904c36b2.title: The veru first sentence in this report is a damn lie. This asshole doesn’t earn his salary.

paragraphs.name: 0cf6
paragraphs.text: The veru first sentence in this report is a damn lie. This asshole doesn’t earn his salary.

eac9eb4e3221.title: Perfect example of someone who needs a lesson in term limits.

paragraphs.name: b610
paragraphs.text: Perfect example of someone who needs a lesson in term limits. Power has corrupted his mind and soul. We have to pry these ticks from the body of our government, now. Once you’ve reached this level of corruption it’s too late for redemption. Vote this man out.

8dc9edb565dd.title: So he didn’t run for office to represent his constituents, he ran to protect his company.

paragraphs.text: So he didn’t run for office to represent his constituents, he ran to protect his company. Sounds pretty much like the rest of them.

852b3e042654.title: The arrogance of power combined with the inability to think of public service as actually serving…

paragraphs.name: 8a67
paragraphs.text: The arrogance of power combined with the inability to think of public service as actually serving the public is always a vile and ugly thing.

87719c5ef9c8.title: House Republican lashes out at constituent for saying his salary was paid by taxpayers

paragraphs.text: House Republican lashes out at constituent for saying his salary was paid by taxpayers

8ead963b7b06.title: So by this self-important fool’s own words he tells all that the only reason he ran for office was…

paragraphs.name: 0f53
paragraphs.text: So by this self-important fool’s own words he tells all that the only reason he ran for office was to bolster his own private business. Wonder if that’s what he campaigned on? This arrogant MMA fighter’s next apparent move would be to threaten every citizen in the room who questions his actions with an ass beating.

a7b75ecc0f35.title: Markwayne Mullin was the same congressman taken to task for criticizing the “Obama Stimulus” while…

paragraphs.text: Markwayne Mullin was the same congressman taken to task for criticizing the “Obama Stimulus” while taking THOUSANDS of taxpayer dollars to expand his “Mullin’s Plumbing” business. He was my congressman and the dumbest, most ignorant hypocrite I think I’ve ever seen in my life!

c36312177b9c.title: When people cite one or two examples to explain a phenomenon or phenomena, I wonder about the size…

paragraphs.name: b9b3
paragraphs.text: When people cite one or two examples to explain a phenomenon or phenomena, I wonder about the size of the population receiving food stamps or other benefits. The fact that a three-term Congressman does not know that food stamp recipients are allowed to have an authorized representative purchase food for them.

74eeeeb27094.title: Proves that all the stupid don’t just live in Texas and Mississippi.

paragraphs.text: People who don’t believe in a parallel universe haven’t been around many Republicans. They truly live in a world of their own.

virtuals.subtitle: It seems he stated his reason for being in office right here. No honor, just business. His own, if fact.

paragraphs.text: You missed a crucial part of the video, at the end. Mullin seems to claim he’s paid back or donated his Congressional salary in the past. Constituents need to press him to show proof.
